titleStmt.title: Charles, by the grace of God, king of Great Britain, France, and Ireland, defender of the faith, to the provotst and bailyes of our burgh of North Berwick ... Forasmuch as our Convention of Estates, holden at Edinburgh, the fourth day of August ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Scotland. Convention of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
A form letter, with blanks in text filled in ms.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fourth day of August, and of Our Reign, the seventeenth year, one thousand six hundred and sixty five years.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
